p: Epidemiological information on the number of confirmed dengue cases with associated serotype information shows that all four dengue serotypes co-circulate in Sao Paulo State ( Fig. 1A). While in 2012 DENV1 (52%, n = 373/712) and DENV4 (39%, n = 274/712) predominated, DENV 2 (9%, n = 64/712) and DENV3 (0.1%, n = 1/712) were also detected. Since 2014 a notable increase in DENV2 cases is observed, with frequencies increasing rapidly from 1.03% (n = 12/1161) in 2014, to 1.39% (n = 23/1650) in 2015, 12.53% (n = 53/423) in 2016, 30.56% (n = 52/423) in 2017, 71.5 (n = 271/379) in 2018 to 87.5% (n = 1539/1758) in the first semester of 2019 ( Fig. 1A).
